title: How do you expect me to buy champions?
body: You seriously haven't fixed the issue that is not allowing me to gain blue essence, so what the hell am i playing for if i cant buy new champions? am i going to be compensated for something that shouldn't be a problem in the first place?

replies.body: I'm sure of what issue exactly you've been having. It looks like you've been able to open several chests and even disenchant some shards for BE so far. What kind of troubles have you been having? I even see you were able to earn enough BE to buy some champions in the past couple of days.
I do not gain BE from winning games or playing at all , its seems to be only when i level up,,
That was what was said in the preseason patch notes. They are getting rid of BE from games and you can only get it from leveling up.
This is why we read people.  It is to keep us informed :D
